purpose: Enhance team communication by integrating AI chat with access to team-specific knowledge and resources.
principle: Utilizes RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to combine AI chat capabilities with team-specific data retrieval for accurate and context-aware responses.
reusability: Offers REST API for easy integration with existing team communication tools and supports custom knowledge base integration.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, limited to specific team knowledge bases, and may require significant setup for custom integrations.
name: onyx
description: Gen-AI Chat for Teams - Think ChatGPT if it had access to your team's unique knowledge.
highlight: Integrates team-specific knowledge with AI chat capabilities for enhanced team communication.
